faqRepairTimeQuestion: How long does a typical repair take?
faqRepairTimeAnswer: Most repairs are completed within 24-48 hours depending on parts availability and the complexity of the repair. Some common repairs like screen replacements can often be completed same-day.
faqDelayQuestion: What if my repair is taking longer than expected?
faqDelayAnswer: If your repair requires special parts or faces unexpected complications, it may take longer. We'll always notify you if there's a delay and provide an updated timeline.
faqCompleteNotificationQuestion: How will I know when my repair is complete?
faqCompleteNotificationAnswer: We'll notify you via email and text message when your repair is complete. You can also check the status anytime on this page using your repair ID.
